wikipedia_page.main: Charles Ramsay is a British stuntman, stunt performer and stunt double and actor for film and television. He has performed in stunt sequences in movies such as Sherlock Holmes and Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time.

response: *Charles Ramsay (British Army officer, born 1936) (1936–2017), British Army officer
*Charles Ramsay, 7th Earl of Dalhousie (died 1764), Earl of Dalhousie
*Charles Ramsay (ice hockey), in the French Ice Hockey Hall of Fame
*Sir Charles Ramsay, 3rd Baronet (died 1695) of the Ramsay baronets
